title: Qiyana insta-gibbed me twice @ lv3 within a minute, I love this damage creep meta so much man
body:
So now being in nearly full health, close to my turret's side, having passive up as {{champion:90}} , won't even survive a braindead combo from a lv 3 {{champion:246}} 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SBTR2Fig5y4&feature=youtu.be
Riot says to create "satisfying gameplay" for us, you know what's satisfying? Is that I figured out that all she has to do is pressing EQWQ within 5 secs to do the kill
Meanwhile I'm killing nearly all my brain cells to try to poke her down to 50%, only to get caught up once and be insta-gibbed.

Not once, but twice within a minute
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4DafN5C5akc&feature=youtu.be 
Guess I'll have to {{summoner:4}}  everytime she engages on me.
Well guess I can have {{summoner:4}} up every minute isn't it.

**RIOT THE DAMAGE CREEP HAS BEEN COMPLAINED FOR LONG AND YET NOTHING IS DONE TO FIX THE MESS YOU'VE CREATED**
There's always a reason why mid-lane consists of only assassins
{{champion:238}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:246}} 
Lets just admit the mages were long gone and you have also forgotten about this class RIOT
 {{champion:112}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:101}} 

**BUT I GUESS YOU JUST WON'T FIX THIS SHIT ANYWAYS BECAUSE YOU LIKE "FLASHY PLAYS" IN THE LC$ MEANWHILE AN ASSASSIN HAVING A TEAMFIGHT ULTIMATE IS TOTALLY FINE FOR YOU RIGHT {{champion:246}} **

replies.body: Love how assassins are supposed to be high skill cap champs but have point and click abilities.
because they need to fight an isolated target?

I hope I'm not the only one that is seeing all the screw ups he made as Malzahar?

Screw up, get punished. Any assassin would 1 shot you there if you didn't had the passive up, and since Qiyana's E breaks your passive, playing against her is like playing without it.

She just makes it obvious how early an assassin can bend you over if you're showing that much disrespect.

EDIT: Ahri is a mage assassin hybrid, not a pure assassin. If you class Ahri as a pure assassin, you can just as well class Diana there just as well. And Azir was nerfed this patch because he was too good of a midlaner in high elo.

Just because yolo que is different than high elo and pro play doesn't mean certain classes are bad.
I won't argue that he screwed up, but assassins shouldn't be 100-ing at level 3, period.

Look, I'm not denying that assassins deal a lot of damage, but that play from Qiyana was actually perfect.

E-AA-Q-AA-WQ-AA-Ignite.

If she flucked any part of that, she'd miss the kill.
Again, level 3 no one should be 100-ing anybody. Period. Zed, Akali, etc can not do it, so Qiyana shouldn't be doing it either.

this shouldn't be a point of contention on the forums but for some reason it is. People don't seem to understand that, no matter how many """misplays""" you make, someone shouldn't be able to 100-0 you without towers involved. 

EDIT: when it's that early in the game.

It should at the very minimum, take 1 1/2 combos from an assassin that early on. This damage creep is just insane. You can't afford to make ONE SINGLE mistake if you are a non hyper-mobile assassin/bruiser, or lane, and possibly even game is lost since they will snowball and oneshot everything. 

On the other hand, they can make numerous mistakes, and if you do manage to get a lead, likely won't be able to snowball it as well because you won't be oneshotting everything with perfect target access and hyper mobility for dives/chase/escapes

> [{quoted}](name=Rylalei,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aNLo3j6e,comment-id=000700000001,timestamp=2019-08-22T17:24:44.090+0000)
>
> Look, I'm not denying that assassins deal a lot of damage, but that play from Qiyana was actually perfect.
> 
> E-AA-Q-AA-WQ-AA-Ignite.
> 
> If she flucked any part of that, she'd miss the kill.

Is that play impressive to you? 

To me, that's... How Qiyana works? It's like being in awe at a Lee Sin wardjumping.

Moreover, even admitting that "play"
 (i.e. dashing towards the enemy and spamming your kit, with AAs in-between the spells) was noteworthy, do you think the Qiyana somehow deserved the kill?

A champion kit can be extremely hard to execute, but it's the output that matters in the end. We're witnessing a lv3 100-0 in a second or so, with zero counterplay for the Malzahar other than "concede cs and stay half a screen away". 

Qiyana did fine, but nothing more than executing her kit correctly.

> Qiyana did fine, but nothing more than executing her kit correctly.

if you execute the kit correctly you get rewarded, this is all the champions on the roster.
like lol is an annie pressing R impressive or not?

annie does less than half her damage. And she needs to stop farming with spells for the stun. 
If any other champ played that perfectly for their champ only like 1 champion gets the kill.
Riven, fizz, renketon, and others simply cant do that much damage. They WOULD NOT get a kill there. Thats the point. People would not kill him there. He is justifiably concerned.

why would she need to stop farming if she's executing correctly?
you see man this is what i hate, ya'll cannot conceptualise champions to a high level.
if that annie is executing perfectly then you get stunned when she flashes you 3 bars in lane, and you get ult stunned when she flashes you 1 bar.
why would she have to sit on 4 bars like it's fucking silver?
like lol do you know how unplayable annie is if someone decides to present some real annie gameplay to you? you'll be zoned out forever.

So Qiyana is fine and Annie is OP, especially in high elo.

Thank for the laughs dude. I almost died in the effort of conceptualizing a champion at high level, the attempt near fried my two brain cells

P.S., just for the memes: in Masters and above, Qiyana has 14% pickrate, 55% winrate and 43% banrate. Annie has 0.9% pickrate, 44% winrate and 0.8% banrate (which is probably a single missclick trying to ban Aatrox)

is it worth telling OP she landed two skill shots on him without using the EQ auto target?

Well, I don't think he'll believe it, he seems to think that he did everything perfect, was the one baiting, etc, but from what it's shown and how perfectly she executed everything, I'm leaning on believing that the one actually baiting was her and those "bad trades" she took were calculated.

He just wants that to not kill him and is concerned that more champs will be like that.
Would it be ok if malz pushed e q and W at her and she died from full hp because minions had a base move speed of 800? would it be fine if xerath hits his E then w qs and it instantly kills any full health champ lvl 3?
No so why is it fine for her?

you guys have never played top lane.
How does that change the argument that "No champion should be able to do that"? Just because it happens doesn't excuse it.

> [{quoted}](name=preternatural,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aNLo3j6e,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2019-08-22T17:21:28.286+0000)

Katarina doesn't do that at level 3. 

Maybe she can kill a 75% hp immobile mage, but not a 90% hp mahalzar with passive up.

Moreover, Katarina **is not that fast** in bursting at this stage of the game, and her damage has **counterplay** (ie daggers AOE), which Qiyana does not.
No one kills this fast this early other than udyr. Im sorry. NO ONE does.
Talon used to, and still does. But he also doesn't have the utility that qiyana does, so that's why he's allowed to get away with it.

LOL. No he does not. I played against one not too long ago and he barely did any damage early game.

Again, NO assassin should be 100-ing at level 3, period.
How bad of a talon were you playing against? I have a friend who mains talon and he's always getting kills pre 6.

kata does indeed do that, not at lvl 3 but at 2, i stated as much, just that it's skill gated, i see some 4 smurf kata's doing this every season into whatever mage you want to insert "here"
home boy malz had plenty of time get away, he had 2 skillshots to dodge, that's ample.
qiyana btw, iunno how to tell you guys this, unless she's holding the grass you should know exactly what she's looking to do.

No she doesnt. How would she even get the dagger at lvl 2, shunpo? then she used q e ? thats it maybe another e thats like 400 damgae max, Qiyana does 400 with just he E auto. The q w q auto does another 600. I will repeat NO ONE kills this fast in league rn. Even talon or rengar cant do this.
You just really hate assasins.

Mind if I reply just here? You commented the same thing multiple times, and this one is the latest one I found, so.....there's no point in writing the same thing everywhere.

Now, let's MATH TIME.

Malzahar at level 2 has 600 HP, with Doran's Ring, it's 680, but he's not at max HP, right where his HP bar was then, it was around the 500-550 mark.

Let's just go with 550 since it's more stable.

Qiyana's E damage is negligiable as she broke the passive with, but visually, it did like 20-30, let's go with 20 as it was her passive that dealt the damage.

So that leaves Malz with 530 HP, her AA since it's empowered would've hit for 66+10 LS + 10 adaptive + 12 = 98. 530 - 98 = 432, then she uses Water Q, which deals 89, so 432 - 89 = 343, then another empowered AA, which this time applies passive, so it's 118, leaving him with 225, taking him bellow half HP, then Wall Q, which deals 89 + 54 as bonus since he's bellow half, equalling to 143, leaving Malz with 82 HP, Ignite deals 110 damage at level 3, and since he died on the last tick of Ignite (as he used his potion way too late), the Ignite dealt it's whole 110 damage, so Qiyana, with electrocute (which I didn't math it, as I didn't math in the armor Malz has, too tired for that) did around 440 damage.

440 damage using 1 Q, 2 AA, 2 passive procs, Electrocute, 1 Q with execute damage.

Just for amusement, let's look at Zed vs that Malz with no passive.

Zed has 68 base AD at level 3 + 10 LS + 10 adaptive = 88, so 2 AA from Zed is 176, + 41 being from his passive = 217. Considering the position where Qiyana and Malz are, Zed would've easily hit a double Q, there are no minions between them, so Zed's Q would deal full damage, being (80 + 20) x 2 = 200, then E adding another 78, and we have Zed being able to deal in that exact situation, without counting the electrocute proc or the armor, 495 damage. Qiyana did (again, without counting elec or armor), 468. That's almost 30 less damage on Qiyana, with a much more complex combo than what Zed would have to do.

Basically, in that exact same situation, Malzhar's getting a new one, regardless if it's Zed or Qiyana.

level 3 Qiyana EQWQ with 1 auto does 332 + 434% bonus ad + 100% total ad

passive, procced twice since it resets on W:
23 + 55% bonus ad 
23 + 55% bonus ad

Q, procced twice since its reset, plus bonus damage on low health:
80 + 90% bonus ad
80 + 90% bonus ad
48 + 54% bonus ad

W from single auto:
8 + 20% bonus ad

E:
70 + 70% bonus ad


Zed full combo WEQ with 1 auto does 270 + 280% bonus ad + 100% total ad

passive:
6% max health, like 40 damage

Q twice:
80 + 100% bonus ad
80 + 100% bonus ad

E
70 + 80% bonus ad


level 3 Qiyana EQWQ with 1 auto does 332 + 434% bonus ad + 100% total ad
Zed full combo WEQ with 1 auto does 270 + 280% bonus ad + 100% total ad

hmm

> [{quoted}](name=MiracleMorg94,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aNLo3j6e,comment-id=0007000000000001,timestamp=2019-08-22T19:28:08.795+0000)
>

oh yes they do.

talon you just have to W both strokes, melee Q, 2 auto's and ignite.
that's a dead someone it doesn't matter who it is.
maybe 3 auto's for the beefy boi's.
for malz you just get his shield down on a previous rotation and assume he positions like the example in the OP.

kata is more finesse, you leave a dagger out on the map, as it's cooldown is coming back up and your opponent just so happens to be just in range of it, you begin the dance.
shunpo onto the champion, edge it to the blade so that you pick it up and get the dmg off.
auto, auto, q, auto, E (onto champion not the dagger, but do collect the dagger at the same time), ignite, press B, finisher shunpo, and shunpo out again cause you're now under turret.
well done you are now the katarina master.
i wish i was fucking playing with this shit lol.
if she's against a malz then she no doubt q'd off his shield ages ago.

No they do not. Check base damages. I did she has twice the next assasins damage.
If qiyanna takes q lvl 2 and 1 point in her w, she can q twice and deal 320 base and 288% bonus ad, BEFORE she factos in the auto that does 100% total AD, 25 bonus damage and 55% bonus ad. She has a ratio of of 3.43x bonus ad AND a over 300 base damage AND 100% total ad AND 25 bonus damage AND 8 more bonus damage AND 20% more bonus ad rocking it to 3.63% bonus ad.
Zed q lvl 2 plus w does like 230 base and 200% bonus ad THEN he hits an auto for 1x total ad and 6% health and has less base ad anyway.
If instead we go lvl 1 all abilities, its 160 base damage 200% bonus ad 70 base damage and 80% bonus ad, still lower by almost 1x bonus ad and 140 base damage. 
I mean we can drop the highest base damage champ of fizz in here, and watch as even HE strikes a lower number using 2 w charges his e and his q for a charge of w and even he falls below her by A LOT.
Early game base damage and base ad mean a LOT. She has pretty high of both.

qiyana has more stats, she actually has 150 range with a hoop too for some fking reason while most champs with actual longer weapons are chilling with 125. actually outranges over half the melee champs in the game as an assassin with higher damage and mobility, smh. 
oh shit and she gets to reset her Q. 

waay too strong
Uh no. I've played this game for the past 5 years, and both of those situations do not kill champions.

that's literally the play every assassin goes for at lvl 3, you're going for the kill.
you never position like that around an assassin when they have lane priority cause you autolose that, go watch any match replay from KR challenger or what have you.
what's also funny is that you see those players executing the same as this qiyana and they don't secure kills despite landing all the moves, how is that happening?
did malz have bone plate?
second wind?
anything in resolve tree? oh i guess sorcery and domination is too valuable against the assassin that i don't know how to position against.

LOL no it's not. I've played against thousands of assassins and they do not always go all in, because they can't kill at level 3, period.

What's funny is that you apparently don't read how we are counter arguing against you with facts and just go straight to your own conclusions.

Other players aren't getting the kill because they aren't supposed too.

Even if Malz didn't have defensive runes, Qiyana should not be 100-ing at level 3.

> [{quoted}](name=MiracleMorg94,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aNLo3j6e,comment-id=0007000000000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-23T03:38:59.079+0000)

duuude every assassin can lvl 3 you.
leblanc, talon, kata, ekko, zed, fizz, kass if he's managed his Q correctly which no one ever does, top lane rango is gonna lvl 3 malphite, akali, nidalee, irelia.
like lol i don't even get why i'm responding here 80% of the fucking roster excluding assassins can lvl 3 someone if they so chose to.
adc's, because adc's love bitching about their role being weak, they all in at lvl 2 in solo lanes because they get lane priority via their range.
vayne, lvl 2, top lane, she has her tumble and her W, now she chases you down whatever length of lane there is and if you want to turn around and hit her she just tumbles away and get's another AA in, then uses her passive to run you down for the last 2.
this is every vayne since season 2 in top lane.
trynda and udyr lvl 1 people.
like lolol here you are thinking someone lvl 3'ing someone is bad juju yet you can't even fathom the lvl 1'ers, essentially the entire roster looks to get an early kill at lvl 3 against their lane opponent unless we're talking pro play where no one is coinflipping their way to success. 
are there certain picks here and there that are stubborn kills at lvl 3? yes there are, but you can still kill them at lvl 3 from full hp if you've setup the lane correctly, this is what i look to do every single fucking game i play.
lvl 1 = poke
lvl 2 = trade
lvl 3 = all in + ignite, i either get a kill or they flash away. doesn't matter who i'm playing this is pretty much a fundamental of soloq.
worst that could happen is this interaction gets stalled out till lvl 4, but you're still gonna make this 80-0 all in no matter which champion you're playing.
if you aren't doing that then no wonder you're on a dummy account.

what's really jarring with all of this is that i have some 1.5mil mastery on ekko, a champion people on these boards keep saying is weak early, the lvl 3 /4 all in is a staple of his though, and if you don't know that you don't know ekko.

and it matters that malz didn't have defensive runes, or a dshield.
he is getting killed by anyone there because of that.
i HAVE TO pick resolve tree into any assassin so that they don't get full value out of poke or trades, maybe i'm against a fizz or leblanc and i go null orb so they can't all in me, i don't get to not respect these champions kill potential in the early game cause doing that will autolose you the game when they all in @ 3 and finalise the kill, because they will all all in you if you're playing at any decent level, when you start playing at a gifted lvl people select runes correctly and such so you'll get an extended trade at lvl 3 or both sides will rescind as one gives up lane priority, go watch any mid lane stream and watch what happens at lvl 3, someone get's clear advantage there and the other half has to back off.
this malz though.
yeah you dead.
you defend him?
yeah you dead too in that situation i can tell, that 1 creep was far too valuable to just let it fall, gotta die for it as any number of champions would do to OP.
this isn't something niche to qiyana or new to the rift, it's been happening since people figured out how to play the game correctly.

And you still arent listening.
